text: Vincent Barabba (born September 6, 1934) is an American market researcher, author, and politician. He was the 14 Director of the United States Census Bureau from 1973 until 1976 and from 1979 until 1981.Vincent Barabba ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Market researchers Category:Writers from Chicago Category:Politicians from Chicago
title: Vincent Barabba
